frontmatter.title: KubeCon+CloudNativeCon
frontmatter.subtitle: Service Mesh Battle Stories and Fixes
frontmatter.author: The New Stack
frontmatter.description: Discover insights from KubeCon+CloudNativeCon on service mesh implementations and best practices. Learn about the evolving landscape of service mesh options like Envoy, Istio, Linkerd, and Kuma. Explore the importance of interoperability and service mesh specifications, presented by Lee Calcote, founder of Layer5.
